tool_description: Analyzes the physical, mechanical, and aesthetic properties of natural and synthetic fibers to provide comprehensive material characteristics for project planning.

fiber_type.description: The type of fiber to analyze (e.g., wool, cotton, silk, alpaca, polyester, nylon)

fiber_grade.description: Grade or quality level of the fiber (e.g., superfine, medium, coarse)

processing_method.description: How the fiber was processed (e.g., combed, carded, mercerized)

error_messages: Unknown fiber type: The specified fiber type is not recognized. Use common fiber names like wool, cotton, silk, linen, alpaca, mohair, cashmere, polyester, nylon, acrylic.
Invalid grade specification: Fiber grade must be one of: superfine, fine, medium, coarse, or mixed.
Unsupported processing method: Processing method must be one of: standard, combed, carded, mercerized, sanforized, or brushed.
usage: Specify the fiber_type you want to analyze. Optionally provide fiber_grade and processing_method for more precise analysis. The tool returns detailed properties including strength, elasticity, moisture absorption, and care requirements.
